xml_template:
<SOAP-ENV:Envelope xmlns:SOAP-ENV="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
    <SOAP-ENV:Header>
        <wsse:Security xmlns:wsse="http://docs.oasis-open.org/wss/2004/01/oasis-200401-wss-wssecurity-secext-1.0.xsd" xmlns:wsu="http://docs.oasis-open.org/wss/2004/01/oasis-200401-wss-wssecurity-utility-1.0.xsd">
            <wsse:UsernameToken xmlns:wsse="http://docs.oasis-open.org/wss/2004/01/oasis-200401-wss-wssecurity-secext-1.0.xsd">
                <wsse:Username>{{XUserName}}</wsse:Username>
                <wsse:Password Type="http://docs.oasis-open.org/wss/2004/01/oasis-200401-wss-username-token-profile-1.0#PasswordText">{{XPassword}}</wsse:Password>
                <wsu:Created xmlns:wsu="http://docs.oasis-open.org/wss/2004/01/oasis-200401-wss-wssecurity-utility-1.0.xsd">{{current_timestamp}}</wsu:Created>
            </wsse:UsernameToken>
        </wsse:Security>
    </SOAP-ENV:Header>
    <SOAP-ENV:Body>
        <LOCAdd xmlns="http://jackhenry.com/jxchange/TPG/2008">
            <MsgRqHdr>
                <jXchangeHdr>
                    <JxVer />
                    <AuditUsrId>{{XAuditUser}}</AuditUsrId>
                    <AuditWsId>{{XAuditWorkStation}}</AuditWsId>
                    <AuthenUsrId />
                    <ConsumerName />
                    <ConsumerProd />
                    <Ver_1 />
                    <jXLogTrackingId>{{guid}}</jXLogTrackingId>
                    <Ver_2 />
                    <InstRtId>{{XInstitutionRoutingID}}</InstRtId>
                    <InstEnv>{{XEnvironment}}</InstEnv>
                    <Ver_3 />
                    <BusCorrelId>{{guid}}</BusCorrelId>
                    <Ver_4 />
                    <WorkflowCorrelId />
                    <Ver_5 />
                    <ValidConsmName>{{XValidConsumerName}}</ValidConsmName>
                    <ValidConsmProd>{{XValidConsumerProduct}}</ValidConsmProd>
                    <Ver_6 />
                </jXchangeHdr>
                <Ver_1 />
                <Ver_2 />
                <Ver_3 />
            </MsgRqHdr>

            <ErrOvrRdInfoArray> 
                {% for ErrOvrRd in conditioningData.ErrOvrRds %} 
                <ErrOvrRd>
                    <ErrCode>{{ErrOvrRd}}</ErrCode>
                    <Ver_1 />
                </ErrOvrRd> 
                {% endfor %} 
            </ErrOvrRdInfoArray>

            <LOCAcctId JHANull="" Rstr="">{{LOCAdd.LOCAcctId}}</LOCAcctId>
            <LOCAcctType JHANull="" Rstr="">{{LOCAdd.LOCAcctType}}</LOCAcctType>

            <LOCCustId JHANull="" Rstr="">{{LOCAdd.LOCCustId}}</LOCCustId>

            <LOCRec>
                <LOCAmt JHANull="" Rstr="">{{LOCAdd.LOCRec.LOCAmt}}</LOCAmt>
                <LOCExpDt JHANull="" Rstr="">{{LOCAdd.LOCRec.LOCExpDt}}</LOCExpDt>
                <LOCCode JHANull="" Rstr="">{{LOCAdd.LOCRec.LOCCode}}</LOCCode>
                <LOCMainLOCId JHANull="" Rstr="">{{LOCAdd.LOCRec.LOCMainLOCId}}</LOCMainLOCId>
                <LOCStat JHANull="" Rstr="">{{LOCAdd.LOCRec.LOCStat}}</LOCStat>
                <LOCBrCode JHANull="" Rstr="">{{LOCAdd.LOCRec.LOCBrCode}}</LOCBrCode>
                <LOCOffCode JHANull="" Rstr="">{{LOCAdd.LOCRec.LOCOffCode}}</LOCOffCode>
                <LOCPrtcpCode JHANull="" Rstr="">{{LOCAdd.LOCRec.LOCPrtcpCode}}</LOCPrtcpCode>
                <LOCDDAProtAmt JHANull="" Rstr="">{{LOCAdd.LOCRec.LOCDDAProtAmt}}</LOCDDAProtAmt>
                <LOCFrzAmt JHANull="" Rstr="">{{LOCAdd.LOCRec.LOCFrzAmt}}</LOCFrzAmt>
                <LOCTaxRefId JHANull="" Rstr="">{{LOCAdd.LOCRec.LOCTaxRefId}}</LOCTaxRefId>
                <LOCOrigTerm JHANull="" Rstr="">{{LOCAdd.LOCRec.LOCOrigTerm}}</LOCOrigTerm>
                <LOCOrigTermUnit JHANull="" Rstr="">{{LOCAdd.LOCRec.LOCOrigTermUnit}}</LOCOrigTermUnit>
                <LOCOrigAmt JHANull="" Rstr="">{{LOCAdd.LOCRec.LOCOrigAmt}}</LOCOrigAmt>
                <LOCInfo JHANull="" Rstr="">{{LOCAdd.LOCRec.LOCInfo}}</LOCInfo>
                <LOCPrtCnsldtStmt JHANull="" Rstr="">{{LOCAdd.LOCRec.LOCPrtCnsldtStmt}}</LOCPrtCnsldtStmt>
                <LOCStmtDay JHANull="" Rstr="">{{LOCAdd.LOCRec.LOCStmtDay}}</LOCStmtDay>
                <LOCStmtFreq JHANull="" Rstr="">{{LOCAdd.LOCRec.LOCStmtFreq}}</LOCStmtFreq>
                <LOCStmtFreqCode JHANull="" Rstr="">{{LOCAdd.LOCRec.LOCStmtFreqCode}}</LOCStmtFreqCode>
                <LOCSemiDay1 JHANull="" Rstr="">{{LOCAdd.LOCRec.LOCSemiDay1}}</LOCSemiDay1>
                <LOCSemiDay2 JHANull="" Rstr="">{{LOCAdd.LOCRec.LOCSemiDay2}}</LOCSemiDay2>
                <LOCCallRptCode JHANull="" Rstr="">{{LOCAdd.LOCRec.LOCCallRptCode}}</LOCCallRptCode>
                <LOCCollatCode JHANull="" Rstr="">{{LOCAdd.LOCRec.LOCCollatCode}}</LOCCollatCode>
                <LOCRiskCode JHANull="" Rstr="">{{LOCAdd.LOCRec.LOCRiskCode}}</LOCRiskCode>
                <LOCLastStmtDt JHANull="" Rstr="">{{LOCAdd.LOCRec.LOCLastStmtDt}}</LOCLastStmtDt>
                <LOCLastMainDt JHANull="" Rstr="">{{LOCAdd.LOCRec.LOCLastMainDt}}</LOCLastMainDt>
                <LOCCurBal JHANull="" Rstr="">{{LOCAdd.LOCRec.LOCCurBal}}</LOCCurBal>
                <LOCTotAdvaAmt JHANull="" Rstr="">{{LOCAdd.LOCRec.LOCTotAdvaAmt}}</LOCTotAdvaAmt>
                <LOCAvlBal JHANull="" Rstr="">{{LOCAdd.LOCRec.LOCAvlBal}}</LOCAvlBal>
                <LOCCommBal JHANull="" Rstr="">{{LOCAdd.LOCRec.LOCCommBal}}</LOCCommBal>
                <LOCRegAvlBal JHANull="" Rstr="">{{LOCAdd.LOCRec.LOCRegAvlBal}}</LOCRegAvlBal>
                <LOCClsCode JHANull="" Rstr="">{{LOCAdd.LOCRec.LOCClsCode}}</LOCClsCode>
                <LOCHighAmt JHANull="" Rstr="">{{LOCAdd.LOCRec.LOCHighAmt}}</LOCHighAmt>
                <LOCLowAmt JHANull="" Rstr="">{{LOCAdd.LOCRec.LOCLowAmt}}</LOCLowAmt>
                <LOCAvg JHANull="" Rstr="">{{LOCAdd.LOCRec.LOCAvg}}</LOCAvg>
                <LOCHighAmtDt JHANull="" Rstr="">{{LOCAdd.LOCRec.LOCHighAmtDt}}</LOCHighAmtDt>
                <LOCLowAmtDt JHANull="" Rstr="">{{LOCAdd.LOCRec.LOCLowAmtDt}}</LOCLowAmtDt>
                <LOCHighAmtLTD JHANull="" Rstr="">{{LOCAdd.LOCRec.LOCHighAmtLTD}}</LOCHighAmtLTD>
                <LOCLowAmtLTD JHANull="" Rstr="">{{LOCAdd.LOCRec.LOCLowAmtLTD}}</LOCLowAmtLTD>
                <LOCAvgLTD JHANull="" Rstr="">{{LOCAdd.LOCRec.LOCAvgLTD}}</LOCAvgLTD>
                <LOCBankNetTot JHANull="" Rstr="">{{LOCAdd.LOCRec.LOCBankNetTot}}</LOCBankNetTot>
                <SvcPrvdInfo />
                <Ver_1 />
                <LOCRedRvwFreq JHANull="" Rstr="">{{LOCAdd.LOCRec.LOCRedRvwFreq}}</LOCRedRvwFreq>
                <LOCRedRvwFreqUnits JHANull="" Rstr="">{{LOCAdd.LOCRec.LOCRedRvwFreqUnits}}</LOCRedRvwFreqUnits>
                <LOCNxtRedDt JHANull="" Rstr="">{{LOCAdd.LOCRec.LOCNxtRedDt}}</LOCNxtRedDt>
                <LOCRedPct JHANull="" Rstr="">{{LOCAdd.LOCRec.LOCRedPct}}</LOCRedPct>
                <LOCSchedRedAmt JHANull="" Rstr="">{{LOCAdd.LOCRec.LOCSchedRedAmt}}</LOCSchedRedAmt>
                <LOCFeeArray>
                    <LnFeeInfoRec>
                        <LnFeeText JHANull="" Rstr="">{{LOCAdd.LOCRec.LOCFeeArray.LnFeeInfoRec.LnFeeText}}</LnFeeText>
                        <LnFeeCode JHANull="" Rstr="">{{LOCAdd.LOCRec.LOCFeeArray.LnFeeInfoRec.LnFeeCode}}</LnFeeCode>
                        <LnFeeAmt JHANull="" Rstr="">{{LOCAdd.LOCRec.LOCFeeArray.LnFeeInfoRec.LnFeeAmt}}</LnFeeAmt>
                        <LnFeeAssmntDt JHANull="" Rstr="">{{LOCAdd.LOCRec.LOCFeeArray.LnFeeInfoRec.LnFeeAssmntDt}}</LnFeeAssmntDt>
                        <LnFeeFreq JHANull="" Rstr="">{{LOCAdd.LOCRec.LOCFeeArray.LnFeeInfoRec.LnFeeFreq}}</LnFeeFreq>
                        <LnFeeFreqUnits JHANull="" Rstr="">{{LOCAdd.LOCRec.LOCFeeArray.LnFeeInfoRec.LnFeeFreqUnits}}</LnFeeFreqUnits>
                        <LnFeeDayOfMonth JHANull="" Rstr="">{{LOCAdd.LOCRec.LOCFeeArray.LnFeeInfoRec.LnFeeDayOfMonth}}</LnFeeDayOfMonth>
                        <LnFeeChgCode JHANull="" Rstr="">{{LOCAdd.LOCRec.LOCFeeArray.LnFeeInfoRec.LnFeeChgCode}}</LnFeeChgCode>
                        <Ver_1 />
                        <LnFeeNxtPayDt JHANull="" Rstr="">{{LOCAdd.LOCRec.LOCFeeArray.LnFeeInfoRec.LnFeeNxtPayDt}}</LnFeeNxtPayDt>
                        <LnFeeLastPmtDt JHANull="" Rstr="">{{LOCAdd.LOCRec.LOCFeeArray.LnFeeInfoRec.LnFeeLastPmtDt}}</LnFeeLastPmtDt>
                        <LnFeeRemAmt JHANull="" Rstr="">{{LOCAdd.LOCRec.LOCFeeArray.LnFeeInfoRec.LnFeeRemAmt}}</LnFeeRemAmt>
                        <LnFeeCaplze JHANull="" Rstr="">{{LOCAdd.LOCRec.LOCFeeArray.LnFeeInfoRec.LnFeeCaplze}}</LnFeeCaplze>
                        <LnFeeId JHANull="" Rstr="">{{LOCAdd.LOCRec.LOCFeeArray.LnFeeInfoRec.LnFeeId}}</LnFeeId>
                        <LnFeeStat JHANull="" Rstr="">{{LOCAdd.LOCRec.LOCFeeArray.LnFeeInfoRec.LnFeeStat}}</LnFeeStat>
                        <Ver_2 />
                    </LnFeeInfoRec>
                </LOCFeeArray>
                <LOCFeeAcctId JHANull="" Rstr="">{{LOCAdd.LOCRec.LOCFeeAcctId}}</LOCFeeAcctId>
                <LOCFeeAcctType JHANull="" Rstr="">{{LOCAdd.LOCRec.LOCFeeAcctType}}</LOCFeeAcctType>
                <Ver_2 />
                <LOCGdnceType JHANull="" Rstr="">{{LOCAdd.LOCRec.LOCGdnceType}}</LOCGdnceType>
                <LOCGdnceBorwAck JHANull="" Rstr="">{{LOCAdd.LOCRec.LOCGdnceBorwAck}}</LOCGdnceBorwAck>
                <LOCGdnceRedType JHANull="" Rstr="">{{LOCAdd.LOCRec.LOCGdnceRedType}}</LOCGdnceRedType>
                <LOCLastRedDt JHANull="" Rstr="">{{LOCAdd.LOCRec.LOCLastRedDt}}</LOCLastRedDt>
                <UserDefInfoArray>
                    <UserDefInfo>
                        <UserDefTxt JHANull="" Rstr="">{{LOCAdd.LOCRec.UserDefInfoArray.UserDefInfo.UserDefTxt}}</UserDefTxt>
                        <UserDefCode JHANull="" Rstr="">{{LOCAdd.LOCRec.UserDefInfoArray.UserDefInfo.UserDefCode}}</UserDefCode>
                        <UserDefDesc JHANull="" Rstr="">{{LOCAdd.LOCRec.UserDefInfoArray.UserDefInfo.UserDefDesc}}</UserDefDesc>
                        <UserDefDt JHANull="" Rstr="">{{LOCAdd.LOCRec.UserDefInfoArray.UserDefInfo.UserDefDt}}</UserDefDt>
                        <UserDefInfo1 JHANull="" Rstr="">{{LOCAdd.LOCRec.UserDefInfoArray.UserDefInfo.UserDefInfo1}}</UserDefInfo1>
                        <UserDefInfo2 JHANull="" Rstr="">{{LOCAdd.LOCRec.UserDefInfoArray.UserDefInfo.UserDefInfo2}}</UserDefInfo2>
                        <UserDefInfo3 JHANull="" Rstr="">{{LOCAdd.LOCRec.UserDefInfoArray.UserDefInfo.UserDefInfo3}}</UserDefInfo3>
                        <Ver_1 />
                    </UserDefInfo>
                </UserDefInfoArray>
                <Ver_3 />
                <Ver_4 />
            </LOCRec>
            <Custom></Custom>
            <Ver_1 />
        </LOCAdd>
    </SOAP-ENV:Body>
</SOAP-ENV:Envelope>
request_body_spec:
(
    . as $root |
    {
        LOCAdd: {
            LOCAcctId: ($root.loan_number // ""),
            LOCAcctType: "L",
            LOCCustId: (
                $root.loan_relations[]
                | select(.is_primary_borrower == true)
                | .external_customer_id // ""
            ),
            LOCRec: {
                LOCAmt: ( .approved_amount // "" ),
                LOCExpDt: ( .maturity_date // ""),
                LOCCode: 1,
                LOCMainLOCId: "",
                LOCStat: 1,
                LOCBrCode: 51,
                LOCOffCode: (.boarding_details?.office_code // ""),
                LOCPrtcpCode: "",
                LOCDDAProtAmt: "",
                LOCFrzAmt: "",
                LOCTaxRefId: "",
                LOCOrigTerm: (.term_in_months // ""),
                LOCOrigTermUnit: "Months",
                LOCOrigAmt: 60000,
                LOCInfo: "",
                LOCPrtCnsldtStmt: "Y",
                LOCStmtDay: 1,
                LOCStmtFreq: 1,
                LOCStmtFreqCode: "M",
                LOCSemiDay1: "",
                LOCSemiDay2: "",
                LOCCallRptCode: "4A",
                LOCCollatCode: 14,
                LOCRiskCode: "",
                LOCLastStmtDt: "",
                LOCLastMainDt: "",
                LOCCurBal: 60000,
                LOCTotAdvaAmt: 60000,
                LOCAvlBal: 0,
                LOCCommBal: "",
                LOCRegAvlBal: "",
                LOCClsCode: "",
                LOCHighAmt: "",
                LOCLowAmt: "",
                LOCAvg: "",
                LOCHighAmtDt: "",
                LOCLowAmtDt: "",
                LOCHighAmtLTD: "",
                LOCLowAmtLTD: "",
                LOCAvgLTD: "",
                LOCBankNetTot: "",
                LOCRedRvwFreq: 100,
                LOCRedRvwFreqUnits: "Months",
                LOCNxtRedDt: "2099-01-01",
                LOCRedPct: "",
                LOCSchedRedAmt: "0.01",
                LOCFeeArray: {
                    LnFeeInfoRec: {
                        LnFeeText: "",
                        LnFeeCode: "N",
                        LnFeeAmt: 345,
                        LnFeeAssmntDt: "2025-11-18",
                        LnFeeFreq: 35,
                        LnFeeFreqUnits: 1,
                        LnFeeDayOfMonth: 10,
                        LnFeeChgCode: 3,
                        LnFeeNxtPayDt: "",
                        LnFeeLastPmtDt: "",
                        LnFeeRemAmt: 0,
                        LnFeeCaplze: 54,
                        LnFeeId: 345,
                        LnFeeStat: "",
                    }
                },
                LOCFeeAcctId: 0,
                LOCFeeAcctType: "",
                LOCGdnceType: "",
                LOCGdnceBorwAck: "",
                LOCGdnceRedType: "",
                LOCLastRedDt: "",
                UserDefInfoArray: {
                    UserDefInfo: {
                        UserDefTxt: "",
                        UserDefCode: "",
                        UserDefDesc: "",
                        UserDefDt: "",
                        UserDefInfo1: "",
                        UserDefInfo2: "",
                        UserDefInfo3: "",
                    }
                }
            }
        },
        conditioningData: {
            ErrOvrRds: [200594],
        }
    }
)
